pullRequest.title: OWLS-81928 - JUnit5: Convert ItManagedCoherence (testCreateCoherenceDomainInImageUsingWdt) test
pullRequest.bodyText:
use case: Test association of a Coherence Cluster with multiple WebLogic server clusters by

Create domain with two clusters, cluster-1 and cluster-2 and associate them with a Coherence cluster
Deploy the EAR file to cluster-1 that has no storage enabled
Deploy the GAR file to cluster-2 that has storage enabled
Verify that data can be added and stored in the cache and can also be retrieved from cache.

Jenkins job:
https://build.weblogick8s.org:8443/job/weblogic-kubernetes-operator-kind-new/824/
one failure, oracle.weblogic.kubernetes.ItMiiSample.testJrfInitialUseCase is unrelated to this PR
https://build.weblogick8s.org:8443/job/weblogic-kubernetes-operator-model-in-image-tests-10/549/
has less failures than result from develop run at https://build.weblogick8s.org:8443/job/weblogic-kubernetes-operator-model-in-image-tests-10/547

commit.message: Converted ItManagedCoherence to use JUnit5 jenkins-ignore
Converted ItManagedCoherence to use JUnit5 jenkins-ignore

nodes.bodyText: This JavaHome  may change in future version of WebLogic image. Should we hard-code it on model file
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,76 @@
+# Copyright (c) 2020, Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates.
+# Licensed under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 as shown at https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl.
+
+domainInfo:
+    AdminUserName: '@@PROP:AdminUserName@@'
+    AdminPassword: '@@PROP:AdminPassword@@'
+    ServerStartMode: 'prod'
+topology:
+    AdminServerName: 'admin-server'
+    ProductionModeEnabled: true
+    Log:
+        FileName: domain1.log
+    NMProperties:
+        JavaHome: /usr/java/jdk1.8.0_211

commit.message: Removed unnecessary fields in model file jenkins-ignore
